MemberSignature.Value: public static string[] GetDirectories (MonoTouch.Foundation.NSSearchPathDirectory directory, MonoTouch.Foundation.NSSearchPathDomain domainMask, bool expandTilde = true);

.method public static hidebysig string[] GetDirectories(valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSSearchPathDirectory directory, valuetype MonoTouch.Foundation.NSSearchPathDomain domainMask, bool expandTilde) cil managed

Docs.summary: Builds an array of directory search paths in specified directory and domains.
Docs.remarks: The array is in the order in which you should search the directories. The directory returned may not exist.
